selectedVerses.text: On its hem you shall make pomegranates of blue and purple and scarlet yarns, around its hem, with bells of gold between them,
They also made bells of pure gold, and put the bells between the pomegranates all around the hem of the robe, between the pomegranates--
And on that day there shall be inscribed on the bells of the horses, "Holy to the LORD." And the pots in the house of the LORD shall be as the bowls before the altar.
